title: New lease of life
creator_credit: Editorial Film Productions, James Mellor and Guy Blanchard
brief_description: Britain’s work in industrial rehabilitation. Follows four typical case histories - a steel erector who has lost a leg in an accident; a clerk who is recovering from a mental breakdown; a young asthmatic with a history of instability; and a secretary, paralysed from the waist down by polio.
